nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model

Class History

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model.History

  • public class History
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for handling the history of the game. The history contains a list of dates, times and it value of sequential won games times the letters used during each word. Those two values multiplied form the value of the score.
    Since:
    2015
